text: leyse-lbirra en tuvellu vucuhekum kibele-lmesriki velmagribi velakinne-lbirra men amene billahi velyevmi-l'ahiri velmelaiketi velkitabi vennebiyyin. veate-lmale `ala hubbihi zevi-lkurba velyetama velmesakine vebne-ssebili vessailine vefi-rrikab. veekame-ssalate veate-zzekah. velmufune bi`ahdihim iza `ahedu. vessabirine fi-lbe'sai veddarrai vehine-lbe's. ulaike-llezine sadeku. veulaike humu-lmuttekun
